0101010010110111 0110110111110111 1 -> sum: 1100001010101111, cout: 0

0011011011000000 1011100100100011 0 -> sum: 1110111111100011, cout: 0
1011001001010001 0110111011000101 1 -> sum: 0010000100010111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
